__e: I asked you to do one thing, and you were too selfish and irresponsible ... to come through for me on a day that, believe it or not, was really important to me!
That's why my present life sometimes seems to somehow be very irresponsible, and to have nothing to do with myself.
She had the kid but said I couldn't see him because I was an irresponsible douche bag.
I mean, I knew you were irresponsible, but this takes it to a whole new level.
Look, the point is there will be a way to figure it out. We did something that wasn't responsible, but we did it because we love each other and we want to spend every day together until we die.
I know you probably think I'm pretty irresponsible, but, um...
